parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds new submenu entry into item on given path.
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuAdd]] [idc, path, text]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuAdd]] [path, text]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Path where the items should be added

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> text: [[String]] - Displayed name for the entry

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] - Index of the item

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[], "Custom Tools"]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Add new entry at the top level to the menu strip in [[Eden Editor]]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[menuDelete]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
